channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter on the side of the pathway near the fence by the entrance of the estate, 19th December
item.description:
Tenant reported on going issue with littering between the fence and pathway. She said that this is not being maintained.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Buxhall Crescent, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Complete mess of e bikes, 19th December
item.description:
Mess of e bikes and scooters. All on the floor.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Balham Hill, Balham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water not draining from pavement., 19th December
item.description:
There is a large puddle of water outside Tesco Express on Anerley Road. I can only assume there is a problem with the drainage or the pavement has sunken slightly

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 72-78, Anerley Road, Crystal Palace, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Playground fence needs to be repaired , it leans and there is gap children can run out of., 19th December
item.description:
There is a missing plank from the fence. I have seen children run out of it making the playground unsafe. Also the whole fence is leaning and In need of fixing . Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kentish Way, Plaistow, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Coned off parking bays, 19th December
item.description:
A resident leaving cones obstructing the highway - 3 bays to reserve their parking space, particularly at school drop off and pick up times.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jaffray Road, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Littering of different things, 19th December
item.description:
These have been here for more than a month and honestly people keep littering this spot all the time.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Crooked Billet Yard, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 19th December
item.description:
8566697 is the ref i was given yesterday. I received an e mail advising this was resolved. The water may of evaporated but the drain hasn't been touched. This will happen next time it rains. All the drains down this road all need cleaning as they are covered in leaves.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nelson Road, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: This relates to an existing report (FixMyStreet ref 8568684)., 19th December
item.description:
In the left of the photo, behind the small tree, you can see water emerging through the newly laid tarmac as the road is being resurfaced. This relates to an existing report (FixMyStreet ref 8568684).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eden Way, Eden Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside Queen’s Park station, 19th December
item.description:
The free newspaper stand outside the station is full of litter - not sure if this falls under Brent Council’s remit but it looks terrible and needs to be emptied

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salusbury Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves have been left in front of our house for months., 19th December
item.description:
This is not the first time I have to report this problem. Every winter leaves are left to pile up in front of our house. Other neighbouring houses don’t seem to have a similar problem with such a pile of leaves even if they have trees in front of our house and we don’t.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cromwell Road, Elmers End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 3rd time reporting this van parking regularly illegally on the estate, 19th December
item.description:
